it.polimi.deib.se2019.sanp4.adrenaline.controller.weapons.targets

Class SquareTarget

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.deib.se2019.sanp4.adrenaline.controller.weapons.targets.AbstractTarget
      • it.polimi.deib.se2019.sanp4.adrenaline.controller.weapons.targets.SingleSquareTarget
        • it.polimi.deib.se2019.sanp4.adrenaline.controller.weapons.targets.SquareTarget

  • public class SquareTarget
extends SingleSquareTarget
    Represents a target of TargetingEffect where all the players in a square get the same damage and marks.

    The square must meet all the requirements of SingleSquareTarget, players that are excluded from the targeting scope will not get damage/marks.

    After execution, the targeted square is saved in the weapon with the target's id.

    Author:
    Alessandro Fulgini

    • Constructor Detail

      • SquareTarget

        public SquareTarget(String id,
                    AbstractWeapon weapon,
                    Match match,
                    ControllerFactory factory)
        Creates a new square target associated to the given weapon. While the id is set on initialization, the other properties receive their default values, which can be changed later by using setters.
        Parameters:
        id - The unique identifier of this target in its effect, not null
        weapon - The weapon controller associated to this target, not null
        match - The match which has to be controlled, not null
        factory - The factory to create needed controllers, not null

    • Method Detail

      • execute

        public boolean execute(PersistentView view)
                throws InterruptedException
        Executes this target given the user of the weapon
        Specified by:
        execute in class SingleSquareTarget
        Parameters:
        view - The view of the player using the weapon
        Returns:
        true if the player chose his target and was able to perform damage/marks false if the player chose not to use the target
        Throws:
        CancellationException - if a request to the user gets cancelled
        InterruptedException - if the thread gets interrupted
